text: "Happy New Year" is a 1980 song by ABBA. It was taken from their seventh studio album Super Trooper. It originally had a very limited release as a single in December. A Spanish-language version was released under the title "Felicidad". That version went to the top 5 in Argentina and Uruguay. The song was covered by the A-Teens. The English-language version was released in late 1999 for the new millennium. It went to number 27 in Sweden, number 15 in the Netherlands, number 20 in Norway and number 75 in Germany. ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Soft rock songs Category:ABBA songs
title: Happy New Year (song)
